product_brief: Robust commercial-grade TLS/SSL and crypto library. Implements TLS 1.3 DTLS 1.3 and QUIC protocols. Reference implementation for cryptographic operations used by majority of HTTPS websites.
Long-term support branch of OpenSSL with extended maintenance. FIPS 140-2/140-3 validated provider available.
Comprehensive Java implementation of cryptographic algorithms. Supports JCE/JCA provider lightweight API PGP S/MIME DTLS TLS OCSP TSP CMP and certificate generation.
Long-term support release with enterprise stability. Includes PQC support and supply chain transparency features.
FIPS 140-3 Level 1 certified Java cryptographic module with Intel AES-NI and SHA-256 hardware support.
C# implementation of cryptographic algorithms for .NET platform with PQC interoperability support.
Modern easy-to-use crypto library. Fork of NaCl with cross-platform support. Focuses on high-security default configurations and misuse-resistant APIs.
primary_platforms: Linux Windows macOS Android iOS WebAssembly

product_brief: Lightweight portable TLS/SSL library for embedded devices to cloud. Supports TLS 1.3 DTLS 1.3 with small footprint. Includes wolfCrypt crypto engine.
primary_platforms: Embedded Linux Windows RTOS ESP32 STM32
relevant_standards: FIPS 203 (ML-KEM); RFC 8446; IETF TLS 1.3 Hybrid KEM

product_brief: Small fast portable SSH implementation with SCP and SFTP support. Designed for embedded and resource-constrained environments.
Universal secure bootloader with HSM integration and PQC support (ML-DSA). Suitable for IoT automotive and aerospace applications.
Open source C library for quantum-safe cryptographic algorithms. Part of Open Quantum Safe project under Linux Foundation PQCA.
pqc_support: Yes (ML-KEM ML-DSA SLH-DSA BIKE HQC FrodoKEM Classic McEliece)

product_brief: OpenSSL 3 provider enabling quantum-safe and hybrid key exchange for TLS 1.3 X.509 and CMS operations.
relevant_standards: FIPS 203 (ML-KEM); RFC 8446; IETF TLS 1.3 Hybrid KEM

product_brief: GNU implementation of TLS SSL and DTLS protocols. Features SRP X.509 OpenPGP authentication. Used by many GNU/Linux applications.
relevant_standards: FIPS 203 (ML-KEM); RFC 8446; IETF TLS 1.3 Hybrid KEM

product_brief: Premier connectivity tool for SSH protocol. Provides secure tunneling multiple authentication methods. Default key exchange now uses mlkem768x25519-sha256 hybrid PQC.
Portable easy-to-use TLS library for embedded systems. Reference implementation of PSA Cryptography API. Small code footprint for IoT.
relevant_standards: FIPS 203 (ML-KEM); RFC 8446; IETF TLS 1.3 Hybrid KEM

product_brief: Enterprise secrets management encryption-as-a-service and privileged access management. Supports PKI SSH transit encryption.
Complete OpenPGP implementation for encryption signing and key management. Supports S/MIME and SSH. Foundation of email encryption ecosystem.
Windows GnuPG distribution with Kleopatra key manager GpgOL Outlook plugin and GpgEX Explorer extension.
OpenBSD fork of OpenSSL focused on code modernization and security. Includes libtls for simplified secure programming.
pqc_support: Yes (ML-KEM 768/1024 imported from BoringSSL - not yet public API)
relevant_standards: FIPS 203 (ML-KEM); RFC 8446; IETF TLS 1.3 Hybrid KEM

product_brief: Google's fork of OpenSSL optimized for Google's needs. Not intended for general use but influences industry standards.
relevant_standards: FIPS 203 (ML-KEM); RFC 8446; IETF TLS 1.3 Hybrid KEM

product_brief: AWS's C99 implementation of TLS/SSL protocols. Designed for simplicity security and performance. Small codebase (~6000 lines).
relevant_standards: FIPS 203 (ML-KEM); RFC 8446; IETF TLS 1.3 Hybrid KEM

product_brief: Modern TLS library written in Rust. Memory-safe alternative to OpenSSL. No unsafe code in core library.
relevant_standards: FIPS 203 (ML-KEM); RFC 8446; IETF TLS 1.3 Hybrid KEM

product_brief: Enterprise PKI and Certificate Authority software. Supports X.509 CMP SCEP EST ACME protocols.
relevant_standards: FIPS 203; IETF LAMPS Composite; FIPS 204; X.509

product_brief: Commercial enterprise PKI platform with cloud deployment HSM integration and crypto agility features.
relevant_standards: FIPS 203; IETF LAMPS Composite; FIPS 204; X.509

product_brief: Machine identity management platform. Automates certificate lifecycle across enterprise infrastructure.
relevant_standards: FIPS 203; IETF LAMPS Composite; FIPS 204; X.509

product_brief: Windows Cryptography Next Generation API. Provides crypto primitives for Windows applications.
Swift framework for cryptographic operations on Apple platforms. Hardware-accelerated using Secure Enclave.
Standard Java security framework providing cryptographic services via pluggable provider architecture.
Microsoft .NET cryptographic services including System.Security.Cryptography namespace.
Low-level cryptographic library used by GnuTLS and other projects. Focus on simplicity and correctness.
General purpose cryptographic library used by GnuPG. Provides wide range of algorithms and protocols.
Mozilla's security libraries supporting SSL/TLS PKCS standards and cryptographic algorithms. Used by Firefox Thunderbird.
relevant_standards: FIPS 203 (ML-KEM); RFC 8446; IETF TLS 1.3 Hybrid KEM

product_brief: Standard API for cryptographic tokens (HSMs smart cards). Defines interface between applications and crypto devices.
Enterprise HSM management software for Luna Network and PCIe HSMs. FIPS 140-3 Level 3 certified.
Enterprise HSM solution with CodeSafe secure execution environment. Supports hybrid classical/PQC modes.
General purpose HSM platform for enterprise cryptographic operations and key management.
Single-tenant HSM clusters in AWS cloud. FIPS 140-2 Level 3 validated. Supports PKCS#11 JCE OpenSSL.
Thales Luna HSMs deployed in Azure datacenters for customer-exclusive use.
Cloud-hosted HSMs for cryptographic key operations. FIPS 140-2 Level 3 certified.
Managed service for creating and controlling encryption keys. Integrates with AWS services.
Cloud service for safeguarding cryptographic keys and secrets. HSM-backed options available.
Centralized cloud service for managing encryption keys. External key manager support available.
Double Ratchet protocol providing end-to-end encryption with forward secrecy and post-compromise security.
Modern VPN protocol using state-of-the-art cryptography. Simple fast and secure alternative to IPsec/OpenVPN.
Open source IPsec-based VPN solution supporting IKEv1 IKEv2 and various authentication methods.
Full-featured open source VPN solution using OpenSSL/mbedTLS for encryption. Enterprise and community editions.
Keyless signing for software artifacts. Part of Linux Foundation. Used for container and artifact verification.
Modern file encryption tool designed as replacement for GPG. Simple explicit and composable design.
Editor of encrypted files supporting YAML JSON ENV INI formats. Integrates with cloud KMS and PGP.
